summary: Completed comprehensive QA testing of FaithTracker Dashboard mobile-first redesign across all 7 tabs. Verified 10 user-requested enhancements including avatars with colored rings, clickable phone numbers, WhatsApp SVG icons, white Complete buttons, overdue badges, stage badges, member context, Financial Aid structured layout, English language defaults, and proper letter case. Backend APIs working correctly. One critical mobile responsiveness issue found: horizontal scroll on 390px viewport.

design_issues.issue: Horizontal scroll detected on mobile viewport (390px). Body width: 475px exceeds viewport width
design_issues.details: The Dashboard has horizontal overflow on mobile (390px width). Body scrollWidth is 475px, causing horizontal scrolling which breaks mobile-first design requirement.

passed_tests: Backend API: Login authentication with campus selection
Backend API: Dashboard reminders endpoint returning correct data
Backend API: Campuses endpoint working
Frontend: Default language is English (not Indonesian)
Frontend: All 7 Dashboard tabs present and functional (Today, Birthday, Follow-up, Financial Aid, At Risk, Disconnected, Upcoming)
Frontend: Avatars with colored rings (48x48px) - amber/purple/teal/blue/red
Frontend: Clickable phone numbers (tel: links) working
Frontend: WhatsApp buttons have proper WhatsApp SVG icon (not Phone icon)
Frontend: Complete buttons have white background (bg-white hover:bg-gray-50)
Frontend: Overdue badges positioned at top-3 right-3
Frontend: Stage badges inline (Week 1, Month 6, First Follow-up)
Frontend: Member context displayed (age + last contact days)
Frontend: Financial Aid structured layout (bold amount text-lg, frequency icon, calendar icon)
Frontend: Letter case correct (Education, Monthly, First Follow-up)
Frontend: Date format is English (Oct, Nov, Dec - not Okt)
Frontend: Buttons have h-11 class (44px height) for touch-friendly interaction
Frontend: Today tab - Birthdays section with amber rings, clickable phones, WhatsApp icon, white Complete button
Frontend: Today tab - Other Tasks with colored rings, stage badges inline
Frontend: Birthday tab - Overdue birthdays section, amber rings, proper letter case
Frontend: Follow-up tab - Grief Support and Accident/Illness sections with colored rings, stage badges
Frontend: Financial Aid tab - Bold amounts, frequency icons, calendar icons, 'Distributed' button text
Frontend: At Risk tab - Member age and last contact displayed
Frontend: Disconnected tab - Avatars with red rings, member context
Frontend: Upcoming tab - 'in Xd' badges visible

critical.details: Body width is 475px, exceeding 390px viewport. This breaks mobile-first design requirement. Need to investigate which element is causing the overflow (likely TabsList or card containers) and add proper responsive constraints.
critical.suggested_fix: Check TabsList overflow-x-auto wrapper, ensure all cards/containers have max-w-full and min-w-0 classes, verify no fixed widths exceed 390px
